alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Hickman; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:07PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dickson, northwestern Williamson and northeastern Hickman Counties through 400 PM CST... At 307 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Centerville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dickson, Centerville, Fairview, Lyles, Bon Aqua and Nunnelly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 163 and 170, and between mile markers 174 and 184. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
